short_summary: Request for Proposal. Liquid Nitrogen Tank Rental and Filling (Quebec, Quebec, Canada)
description: Rental and filling of a liquid nitrogen tank including the installation of the tank and the delivery of liquid nitrogen. Note  All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by  2 PM EST on June 9, 2023.
tags: Liquid Nitrogen Tank Rental and Filling
full_summary:
### Liquid Nitrogen Tank Rental and Filling Procurement

#### Notice Information

* **Title (English/French)**: Liquid Nitrogen Tank Rental and Filling /  Location et remplissage d'un réservoir d'azote liquide
* **Reference Number (English/French)**: WS3999341043 / WS3999341043
* **Amendment Number (English/French)**: 1 / 1

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: WS3999341043 / WS3999341043
* **Publication Date (English/French)**: May 12, 2023 / 12 mai 2023
* **Tender Closing Date (English/French)**: June 9, 2023, 14:00:00 / 9 juin 2023, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date (English/French)**: July 1, 2023 / 1er juillet 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date (English/French)**: June 30, 2028 / 30 juin 2028
* **Tender Status (English/French)**: Expired / Expiré

#### Procurement Details

* **Type of Procurement (English/French)**: Request for Proposal / Demande de propositions
* **Method of Procurement (English/French)**: Competitive - Open bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
* **Selection Criteria (English/French)**: Lowest Price / Prix le plus bas

#### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity Name (English/French)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contracting Entity Address (English/French)**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage / 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage
* **End User Entity Name (English/French)**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) / Ministère des Ressources naturelles (RNCan)
* **End User Entity Address (English/French)**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name (English/French)**: Annie Deslauriers, SPAC/PSPC / Annie Des
